references.paper_title: Community detection and stochastic block models: recent developments
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of community detection and stochastic block models, serving as a foundational resource for the current work.

references.paper_title: The political blogosphere and the 2004 u.s. election: divided they blog
references.reason: This paper introduces the political blog dataset, a real-world network used for empirical validation of the proposed methods in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Mixed membership stochastic block models for relational data with application to protein-protein interactions
references.reason: This paper introduces mixed-membership stochastic block models, an extension of the basic SBM model used in the theoretical analysis of the current paper.

references.paper_title: node2vec: Scalable feature learning for networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the node2vec algorithm, the core embedding method whose theoretical properties are analyzed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Consistency of spectral clustering in stochastic block models
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical guarantees for spectral clustering, which is used as a comparison method in the current paper and highlights some of the challenges in providing such guarantees.
